summary: new versions of the daedric artifacts!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted that Daedric artifact, but in a play Style that suits you better? a 1 handed Volendrung? or a 2 handed Dawnbreaker or Mehrunes Razor?
well heres a mod that adds them in! every daedric artifact covers each play style.

Every weapon uses it's original Texture, the only thing altered is its model. All weapons are located in the same place in game as the original.

this mod includes:

Mask of Clavicus Vile - Light armor
Savior's Hide - Heavy armor
Ebony Mail - Light armor
Volendrung - Mace
Dawnbreaker - Greatsword
Mehrunes Razor - Greatsword
Mehrunes Razor - Sword
The Rueful Axe - Waraxe
Ebony Blabe - Sword
Mace of Molag Bal - Warhammer
author: AryisTacoTrucK
